footer.partnerText: We work side by side with those who feed the world. Join us.

hero.altFuncionario: Chicago Foods employee ensuring production quality
hero.heading: Chicago Foods Highlights

features.title: Customized Production
features.text: Ability to adapt to meet exclusive specifications.

features.title: Quality and Safety as a Priority
features.text: Controlled processes, full traceability, and international food safety standards, while respecting the environment and rural producers.

features.title: Strategic Location
features.text: A complex with silos, distribution centers, and automated production units, positioning Chicago Foods among the most complete agribusiness structures in Brazil.
